lead_paragraph: It's easy to believe the Davis Cup in the last few years has been the plaything of the Big Four in tennis.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic, Murray Set to Decide Fate of Davis Cup This Year
headline.main: Djokovic, Murray Set to Decide Fate of Davis Cup This Year

snippet: It's easy to believe the Davis Cup in the last few years has been the plaything of the Big Four in tennis....
